name: Brannew
text: On Play Look at 3 cards from the top of your deck; reveal up to 1 {Navy} type card other than [Brannew] and add it to your hand. Then, trash the remaining cards.

effect.text: Look at 3 cards from the top of your deck; reveal up to 1 {Navy} type card other than [Brannew] and add it to your hand. Then, trash the remaining cards.

meta.notes: Rarity 'C' is confirmed from the bottom right corner of the card.
